answers.answer: I was told I had GD... went to see one and she just told me what kinds of choices I should be making at certain times of the day. I check my levels 4X a day. But my gtt results wernt very bad. Now that im in the last month-ish I have to see my doc 2X a week to just watch me closer. I get one extra U/S  but thats about it.

question: I have to go every week I think, do I get ultrasounds Everytime I go there? I was told and that made me happy but I was wondering if someone else got one?
title: Going to a diabetes specialist
